subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Boston’s Daisuke Matsuzaka, the major league’s latest big-name Japanese import, will face Seattle’s Ichiro Suzuki, the Japanese icon who helped influence Matsuzaka’s decision to follow suit.
snippet: Boston’s Daisuke Matsuzaka, the major league’s latest big-name Japanese import, will face Seattle’s Ichiro Suzuki, the Japanese icon who helped influence Matsuzaka’s decision to follow suit.
